file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-61-04-04 - AGB CHIP COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AGB CHIP COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the accessory-drive gearbox chip collector drain valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACCESSORY-DRIVE GEARBOX CHIP ALL 72-61-04-000-801-A COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL ACCESSORY-DRIVE GEARBOX CHIP ALL 72-61-04-400-801-A COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - INSTALLA- TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-61-04 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-61-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ACCESSORY-DRIVE GEARBOX CHIP COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do the task, see the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 71-00-00/200) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 72-61-04 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • START 1/2. (2) Put the workstand in the work area. (3) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400) to get access the Accessory-Drive Gearbox. J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the Accessory-Drive Gearbox Chip collector Drain Valve. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 72-61-04 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-61-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ACCESSORY-DRIVE GEARBOX CHIP COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do the task, see the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 71-00-00/200) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Install the Accessory-Drive Gearbox Chip collector Drain Valve. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 72-61-04 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 72-61-04 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
